name: @vcl/vcl.github.io
description: The full documentation of all modules from the VCL org's repos

scripts.git-init: cd dist && git init && git remote add origin git@github.com:vcl/vcl.github.io.git
scripts.git-push: cd dist && git add -A . && git commit -a -m 'doc update' && git push --set-upstream origin master --force
scripts.pregen-doc: npm run bundle-webcomponents && mkdir -p dist && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts dist/

author: n-fuse GmbH
